[[Persela U-21]](1) | champions = [[Persela U-21]] | season = [[2011 Indonesia Super League U-21|2011]] | sponsorship_name = Djarum Indonesia Super League | tv = [[antv]] | website = [http://www.ligaindonesia.co.id/ LigaIndonesia.co.id] | current = [[2011 Indonesia Super League U-21|2011]] }} '''Indonesia Super League U-21''' is a junior level league involving U-21 team of participating clubs in the Indonesia Super League. Building and managing a complete U-21 team is one of the requirements for clubs participating in the ISL, as regulated by the [[Football Association of Indonesia]] (PSSI). == Competition format == Different with the main ISL league, in this junior competition, the 18 participating clubs are divided into 3 groups considering geographical locations.
